timeline.bodyText: I have changed the isUmbrella from true to false in order to have right value in documentation, but I have not been able to determine if it has effect on code.
timeline.author: mmadoo

timeline.message:
[doc only] #2044 [Documentation] Some properties like index.*.elasticsearch.create.ext.number_of_shards are not present in configuration reference

Signed-off-by: Nicolas Trangosi <nicolas.trangosi@dcbrain.com>
